dcterms:creator: J. Andén
S. Mallat
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: J. Andén
S. Mallat
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for machine learning and computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: J. Andén
S. Mallat
dcterms:description: A dataset of street view house numbers, consisting of over 600,000 labeled digits. It is used for digit recognition tasks in images taken from street view.
dcterms:title: SVHN2
